Content: Tell me whenever you feel strange. N-not for the sake of the quests. I just... feel you might need me.
The wind flowed beside my ears and whispered a spellbinding story, do you wish to hear it?
Those beautiful raise yearnings in us. Dawns after long nights, breezes after rainstorms, and... and your smiling face.
Streams around you are different: they disturb minds that come too close. But I can't just stand aside and watch. I want to stay close to you if I may, no matter what storm you will bring.
Call my name when you’re in need... From lands of desolation to places of vibrancy, from beginning to end of the world, I shall witness everything at your side as long as you wish.
Songs are resonances that burst from the bottom of your heart. They carry the sincerest feelings.
Will it bring burdens to people... when you care too much for them?
Wuthercake, Four-Great Tofu, Tiancheng Maocai... Let me show you some local dishes next time. Oh, they are all my favorites, no particular order.
Shouldn't any food be treated seriously? Hm? If, if it's unpalatable cuisine...
Those beautiful things do exist, even if they don't happen to me. To only witness and watch over them is sufficient for me.
Interested in my ribbon? It's gift from a wild friend for my admission into Midnight Rangers. Stripes of winds are engraved upon to celebrate a rebirth, and also remind me of the true purpose.

Sharp senses once put me in severe pains. Messages flooded from everywhere with noisiness, disorder, and violence, and I was but a feather in the storm. However... (deeply breathing) it's OK... it's all gone. I have found the key to stabilizing the direction, and by that, I have found you.
Happy birthday, Rover. (clear throat and start singing) Happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you...
Falling lightly and lingeringly... Where in the distance will we be led to?
Wind scatters things, and gathers things. Coming and going is a constant of nature. Don't mind it too much.
Can I sing you another song when... I am more prepared?
I am Yangyang. The flowing streams of wind guided me to you... I have a vision that for a long time coming, we will keep each other accompanied for the journey.
Listen to the sounds in wind with me.
The lark's song is about to sound.
To the best of me, I will respond to your expectations.
Only... making it here with you.
You got quite the moves. Think ya can show me a thing or two sometime?
Here for another round? Hmph... Who said I was backing down? By the way, new rule: get rid of your terminal this time!
Forget it, enough trading fists. Here, I got you a macram bracelet from home. Which means from now on, I have you covered!
We've been through enough fire and water. Life's never been easier with a hero carrying you to victory all the time, right?

Hey, you and I go back a long way. If you ever find yourself in a pickle, all you have to do is shout out "Chixia! Save Me!" three times, and I'll come to your rescue before you even know it! How's that for a faithful?

The hero plays at Tiancheng Theater are the best! Especially during new years, everyone would gather around and sit together at the theater, filled with joy and laughter on their faces. If dad's up there watching, he might be chuckling too.
Hero is one to solve everyone's troubles. Look no further, Chixia, Ally of Justice, ready to serve and protect!
Victor Savor, a sauce so good you'll munch an old shoe with it.
What's there to be picky about? Filling bellies should be the first thing about foods.
May Sui'guang, Hierarch Loong, sages, celestials, saints, and all walks of holy holiness, bless everybody of Tiancheng with healthy wellness.
As for these pistols, what matters is who you're wielding them for, makes it all the more meaningful.

Back in the day, when I was on the field, my enemies would tremble with fear at the sound of my name. I was a force to be reckoned with! Huh? How'd I end up in the Ministry? What do they call it again, oh... "A gun afar, cannot quell TDs at home".
Happy Birthday! Try this, I made this bow of Maocai all by myself. I even added some extra Victor Savor to it. Eat up while it's still steaming! Don't mind the spiciness, it's a good omen!
In need of assistance? Chixia answers your call!
Everyone safe and sound, then these gun skills are not unfound.
Chixia, Ally of Justice, at your service! Are you the one in need of a hero?
Alright, let's do this as a team!
Here I come to save the day!
Huggghhh... I can feel the power!
At this rate, the entire Tiancheng City... No wait. The whole of Huanglong shall be known to this hero's name!
Muahaha! TDs, MOs, I can take on whatever comes in my way! I shall safeguard the entirety of Tiancheng with my newfound powers! Hey! Stop giggling, that means you, too!
I can do this all day!
There's always a shortcut for a hero!
Now, what do we have here? Ya can't hide from me!

According to the Verina Law, your appearance shall have an influence on our current ecosystem. Umm... In other words, you're a special kind. Hmm? I have evidence to support my claims, you know, exotic species will have more or less impact on the local ecosystem, not to mention human societies. But well, based on my observations, not only are you not harmful, on the contrary, you're actually beneficial to the ecosystem.
Oh, please forgive me, I didn't mean to take you as a research subject, I'm just... really curious about exceptional things, I get easily carried away when doing research.
Why the enthusiasm for plant research? Hmm... Where should I start? I've spent most of my childhood inside a specimen room for greenery, that's probably where the passion began.

From a small seed to a full-grown plant, fascinating, don't you think? Amount of grow lighting, temperature, and humidity all have influences on a plant's growth, if not given enough care, it may wither when still a seedling. Of course there are plants that could survive even the worst conditions, this applies to us humans as well.

Come to think of it, the two of us are just like dandelion seeds swept into the sky by wind. We may end up in an unacclimatized land and encounter harsh storms, or may have the luxury of sprouting on a rainbow glistening day. Rover, as both strangers in a different land, I hope you can look forward to every second that is to come, wherever you are. I think this is the true meaning of life.
To me, witnessing the vitality in life along the journeys of exploring nature is immensely meaningful.

I could hardly take control of myself lately... Huh? That's the wrong way to put it? Oh, right-oh, it should've been 'I could hardly take care of myself'. With so many papers pilled up recently, plus I have to get ready for the Academy's Botanical Symposium. So much to do, so little time.

Dim Forest is rich in species of fungi, during our research we would often make stew out of Coriolus with Limox meat, it is truly delicious. Hmm? You've heard people mention seening dancing mushrooms after eating it? Then they must've gotten the bad ones. Here, take this "Guidebook to Edible Fungi", it'll come in handy.

Lighting for sciophytes and photophytes are objective conditions required for their respective growth, while human preferences are rather subjective. Each type of food is a gift from Mother Nature, they should all be treated equally.

(My dream is)To become the most famous botanist known across the world, and prove to everyone a Resonator's worth! You think it's hard too, right? No matter how hard, I will never give up, because it's a promise I made with mother.

You mean this? They're not just any ordinary goggles, they're a gift from my mother, you can use it to monitor the surrounding environment in real time, very nifty for plant finding! Here, wanna give a go?

Have you ever heard of the sound of a seedling breaking through soil? As though starlight riding through the endless galaxy, after traveling the years in loneliness, the sound of joy when finally observed by mankind. Every plant has their own unique voice, narrating their stories. Unlike humans, plants are more candid, they're stories do not fill with lies, conspiracies, and prejudices... Only the desire for life, that's why I prefer to have plants as company.

"Birthday" is a charming word, entrusted with expectations for life. Here's a Starflower I specially grew just for you, the only one of its kind. When night falls it will shine bright, hoping to light up your paths ahead. Happy Birthday.
Target sighted! It's... It's a species seen never before!
Good, good, no sign of grazes, progress is smooth.
Shh... There are plants here sensitive to sound. Sense any abnormal noises and they'll never bloom, so don't startle them.

My name is Jueyuan, Tiancheng's Greenery Gardener and Distinguished Researcher. Huh? You want me to join your field research team? Well you've picked the right person for the job. But the wilderness is filled with dangers, make sure you finish reading this "Mutant Flora" I've written before we set off.
Field research? Leave it to me!
According to the Verina Law, inactivity is one of the key reasons leading to biological extinction. We should get going!
Ohhh... Embracing Mother Nature with an admiring heart may bring new discoveries!
It's sprouting already! The soil texture is superb.
Nice, the amount of sunlight is just right, perfect for some petiole stretching.
Nutrient solutions can help with growth, but careful not to use too much or you'll cause a root burn.
I really can't believe you're a novice gardener. These flowers are flourishing under your care. Just look at these buds, I'm really looking forward to a garden full of blossoms now.
There is a soul in all.
Resources for adventuring! Thanks, Mother Nature.
Getting stiff. I need some stretching.
It turns out everything in the world sounds so fine.
The unknown is indeed frightening, but I won't stop advancing.
Feel the sounds of all sorts.
Make it happen, the journey to find memories.
What sound to be heard this time?
Even with slight sounds, I sense strong emotions.
As I hear more sounds, the memories of the past surface before me.
New encounters bring new sounds. I want to hear more sounds of this world.
Sword and shadow at my command.
The wind is urging my voyage.
Don't approach me rashly. It's dangerous, I mean, to you.

My Lady once told me, if I'm unable to differentiate someone between a human or a TD, then I should treat them with kindness at first, and only act after confirming what they are. Though, I haven't had any trouble getting along with you.
You wish to get closer? Do as you please if you feel no fears.
Coldness surrounds me. Or you want to share it with me?
Yet another savior of mine, from hell.
Snow, one of the few pure beings.
If one day I should lose myself in this chaotic world, I wish it would be you to... No, a royal guard is no coward.
I shall finish the dumplings my Lady cannot stomach. Such warming, gentle taste it melts even the hardest ice.
Once I was brimmed with hunger and snatched a mouthful of snow. The snowflakes sliding down my throat. A chill through the bones.
May fortune favors our nation and brings prosperity and security. My Lady's wish is my wish.
Secrets of others are always visible to me, regardless of my will, thus others are rightfully fearful of me. Don't get close if you are not prepared.
I walked distances in vast expanses of snow, in search of an unchanging figure. In the end? I found her, naturally. Not only that, but she's also become the reason for my existence.
Per traditional Huanglong manner, I should send sincere greetings to you, Rover from afar, on special days. So, Happy Birthday. This nameless snowflake only blooms for you on this day.
May the snow be ever pure.
A strange way of training... But she insists this would work, ha.
What does the world look like in your eyes? Plain... how lucky.
Sanhua, Hierarch Guard. No need to remember my name, as my duties are of your only concern: My Lady's safety above all else. Dare to disrespect her and I shall show no mercy.
We should depart while I still recognize you.
Destination? I can lead the way.
This feeling, as though a freshening breeze, whisking away the dust covered snow.
I can feel my ice blade getting sharper, and my vision getting clearer.
Refined skills, to become a finer blade for My Lady.
With such power, I could slice through anything, however distorted it is. Don't worry, I promise I will look closely each time before I strike.
Not the first time I've been to hell.
A different perspective for a change.
This is part of the training.
In accordance to the laws of Huanglong, these items are rightfully yours.
Haaaaa ... not yet work hour, visitors please return... Oh? It's you. Is there any urgent matter that you have to see me for?
Don't keep yourself in a hurry, take time to rest. Anyway, work is never done. (a little playful and complaining in the last sentence)

There are places in Tiancheng that are great for relaxing and refreshing. One of them is the pavilion beside the Ministry of Development, really suitable for getting in a trance, napping, and sunbathing. Pop in some time and sit a while if you will. (Get lazy when voicing "trance, napping and sunbathing")
If you find some new places for relaxing, don't forget to show me. Only me knowing it is enough, because it will be a little secret between us.
You are just like those kids at the Ministry: can't hind any thoughts of yours, can you? Shhh... Don't you let them out before I do.
If only I could bathe in the sun all day with perfect laziness. Alas, so many works that you're never getting rid of...
The comfort of bubbling, gushing fish soup, with its well-cooked aroma and milk-white smoothness. I always take a bowl every time I return from a battle. It almost restores me to my full self.
It's not a good habit to be fussy about your food.
By the time I can retire relieved and reassured, surely there will be nothing posing threats to Tiancheng. How I wish that day should come earlier.
The Forte Amplifier is indeed a weight for me. But I haven't unloaded it ever since I took it on my back. It is a responsibility after all. (the official name of her backpack is Ability Booster)
It wasn't an easy thing to inherit Xuanwu's power. I myself was resistant to that. And then... hmm... one grows up, you know.
Here, Taoqi's special Tow Tow, ranked the best massager over the whole Tiancheng. Take some good rest on this rare day of your birthday.
Haaa (yawning)... all work and no idle makes Taoqi a dull girl. Neither should you keep yourself bustling.
Hmm... The kids at the Ministry are getting even more reliable.
Look at the sky, it's so beautiful, even today. (a little sad, thinking of her late father)

We are not open for business yet, please re... Oh? Already? Fine then. Greetings Rover, I am the acting chief officer of the Ministry of Development. Should you need any help, you can find me at the Ministry. Remember though, that I am merely acting. If your matter isn't something of emergency, go to little Firecracker. (Lazy for the first sentence. Some unwillingness in "Already? Fine then." Then get formal. For the last sentence of "if you matter..." though, show a bit of ease and wit)
Have you encountered some sticky problems? (caring elder sister's tone)
Hm, well refreshed. Let's use this energy to finish all the piled-up to-dos! So we have one, two, three... Haaa (yawning), so many works, got sleepy again...
Feeling a lot more productive... Eh, does it mean I don't have to work overtime?
The Ability Booster is fully energized! Well, it seems not the best time for rest.

Mmm... can easily splay Tiancheng's shield now, another step towards my early retirement~ Congratulations to myself. What should I do when I retire... Hmm... Maybe by then I may travel by your side with no worries. I have never been to places outside Huanglong. When we go, I will make it a “never do” to complain about my walking slow.
I shall be the first barrier!
Don't worry. (comforting, seems like "your sister came to help you")
It's sturdy, isn't it. (another hint of Taoqi's weight)
Phew... Take it slow, don't hurry.
Getting stiff. I need some stretching.
It turns out everything in the world sounds so fine.
The unknown is indeed frightening, but I won't stop advancing.
Feel the sounds of all sorts.
Make it happen, the journey to find memories.
What sound to be heard this time?
Even with slight sounds, I sense strong emotions.
As I hear more sounds, the memories of the past surface before me.
New encounters bring new sounds. I want to hear more sounds of this world.
Sword and shadow at my command.
The wind is urging my voyage.
Pain was not the original intent of the cold. Consider it as a reminder, a reminder to keep your distance.
While I understand and acknowledge the value of sentiment, I have no need for something so unpredictable. It's the best solution to avoid unexpected outcome.
Your abilities are prominent, I have expectations for you as well. Don't get me wrong, these expectations are of doubt, not trust.
Just to be clear, I have no intention of sacrificing myself for anyone. You are no exception...... Even so, do you wish to continue your approach?
You...... It's unbelievable how easily you cross the line.
Relics of purity, tends to bear the essence of sincerity.
The rational boundary has already been drawn, yet some always seek to cross it.
Perillas can be found almost anywhere, I always collect them along the way during archaeological expeditions. Very refreshing and tasty when served as cold salad.
Food with high calories and sweetness is the natural enemy of maintaining a good physique. But they are acceptable for filling one's stomach when in the wilds.
Sooner or later, I will unveil the evils and enigma hidden beneath the ice fields.
These two rings I wear on my hand, one for remembrance, another for anticipation. One's life is too short to make any stops for meaningless matters.
Thinking about it rationally, You'Tan was destined to appear no matter what. Instead of relying on others, I need a copy of myself more than anything.
Happy Birthday, here's a year's worth of health management and workout planner I made just for you.
You'Tan just informed me: We should get moving.
A short nap helps improve efficiency.
Bond is a burden. I have no need for it.

Bailian, archaeologist of the Huanglong Academy. I don't cause troubles, and don't like to be troubled either. I could only take responsibility for myself. If you think that's acceptable, then let's begin our partnership, shall we?
No one is a necessity here. Before relying on each other, it's best to become independent as an individual.
Everything is in order, we may depart anytime.
A well deserved outcome, lead by a well persisted training.
Hmm? This degree of increase in strength can't possibly be gained through mere exercise. What did you do? Rover.

Not only a gain in strength, but also a clear in mind. How is this...... Never mind, as long as you can perform your tasks in a more efficient manner, whatever secret you may have employed is none of my concern.
The "Personal Breakthrough" you've mentioned proved to be rather effective. You'Tan and I have never felt so full of energy. Hmm...... Thank you, Rover.
I shall fight till the end!
Take it, a gift of civilization.

It really hurts to forget everything, doesn't it? I know how you feel. Well, because An'ke's just like you, after waking up inside Black Shores I couldn't remember anything. It's like, umm... cooking but without the main ingredient, it's just not how the dish is supposed to be.

I actually really admire Rover. Even though you've lost your memories, you're still able to protect everyone. An'ke's always the one being protected, just like a flower in the garden house. From inside, I can view the vast skies and oceans, but lives under an invisible dome. I want to be someone everyone can depend on, too.
I will get stronger and stronger quick, that way, no one will treat me as a little kid anymore. Everyone will believe in An'ke more, right?
What happened yesterday doesn't matter, what's more important are today and tomorrow! Just like me, Rover should hold your head high and heart strong!
Pinky swear! Even if Rover meets new friends in your adventures, don't ever forget about An'ke!

Black Shores' sea winds, sunrise at the garden house, Rebirth Parterre's Blake Blooms... There's so many of An'ke's favorites. Umm... If I have to choose, then it's everything. Well, of course that includes Rover visiting Black Shores!
Now, what to do to get everyone in Black Shores fall in love with An'ke's cooking?
Gulpuff meat sliced into strips then dipped into Pyroxene dust. Voilà! An'ke's new dish Dusted Gulpuff Slices is served! Rover, have a taste!
Food that I don't like? I don't have one, An'ke can turn anything into a tasty treat! It really does taste good! Hmph, why won't anyone believe me?
There's so many baddies in this world, as long as An'ke puts in the effort, I'll beat 'em up real good!
Curly and Cosmos are An'ke's besties. Everyone's afraid of Cosmos, but... but as long as An'ke keep an eye on him, Cosmos usually behaves.

Have you ever heard of the Naughty Doctors? Aalto says they quietly sneak into naughty children's dreams and gives them the needle as punishment. Hmph! Liar, liar, pants on fire! An'ke haven't blown up the kitchen in a while now, then why am I still having dreams about them?

Rover, Happy Birthday, I snuck into the kitchen and made this birthday cake for you. Made from top grade ingredients, it's gonna taste great. What ingredients you ask? Heron Eggs, Limox Milk, Leukite Druse dust, ah, and most importantly, this flower on top really took me quite an effort to pick from Incineranur! Looks nice doesn't it? Huh? your face tells me you're really looking forward to it! Well dig in!
Settle down! Hmph, An'ke's getting angry. Whoopee... Now you're flying!
One sheep, two sheep... Fifty-five... Umm? Where was I?
Coral Bowl is really good! Wanna give it a try?

Black Shores member, An'ke, reporting for duty! Wanna count sheep with me? Cloudy, Cosmos, calm down you two, you're gonna scare our new friend. (*Chuckles) Relax, relax! Cosmos is a good Wooly, he won't hurt you.
An'ke never gets left behind! Let's go!
Concentration, Vigilance, and Affinity. The essential characteristics as a Black Shores operative!
"Baa, baa!" Woolies say they're really happy!
Hurray! Now they won't treat me as a kid anymore, right?
Raaaar-- Woolies' fury are ablaze. Baddies, you're in for it, now!
No! Don't come close to me!
Wow, any cooking ingredients? I want a look-see!
I love candies, but I won't just accept anyone's candy. Er, Were you about to give Danjin a piece of candy?
I don't have a lot of friends... Or maybe I had some before, I can't remember anymore. Does Rover wish to be my friend?
Rover has given the Midnight Rangers lots of help. As a thank you, can I come along as well? I can help out, I promise!
My hairstyle looks unusual? Hehe, I'm a girl who likes to look pretty too, you know. How about I help you brush your hair later.
Why don't you join the Midnight Rangers Rover? That way you'll be one of us, my family, and, so you won't leave me so easily...
I will cherish every minute and second spent with those precious to me. With these every piece of happiness, one day, Danjin will be made whole again.
I need to take my medicines every day. They taste so bitter. Ohhh, Danjin wants more candy.
Is Loong Beard Crisp really as loooong as a real loong's beard? Aww, I really want to give it a try.
Something that tastes bitter? (*shakes head in disapproval) Uh-uh! Ah, I remember now, there's also this sweet liquid-thingy I don't really like as well. Hmm... Now what was it?
My hopes for my family. Forever in peace, living well and in happiness. I am willing to give everything in exchange for it!
To be honest, it hurts after each battle, but knowing it was for everyone, any amount of pain wouldn't matter, even if I have to... Please don't leave Danjin behind alone...
I don't have any close relatives, but the Commander tells me every one at the Rangers are my family. As long as the Midnight Rangers stand, I will not be alone.
Rover, Happy Birthday. On my birthday last year, everyone at the Rangers made me birthday noodles, so now I've made <i>you<i> one. May you live a long life just like the Divinity Sui'guang!
When two roses entwine, should one weep or rejoice? Hmm...? Now why would I remember this?
This is so good... Oh Promise me you won't tell anyone, Danjin will be a good girl and brush her teeth!
Looking at this jade pendent, I feel like, as if I've lost one myself as well... Ugh, I'm feeling a bit drowsy...
Greetings, Rover. I've heard lots of stories from everyone at the Rangers about you, I've been wanting to meet you... From now on, is it ok if I follow along with you in protecting everyone?
I will not allow anyone hurt those I cherish.
To protect those dearest to me, I'm willing to take tougher training.
Think I deserve a Loong Beard Crisp as humongous as the effort I've put in becoming stronger.
Haha... Danjin's now gotten so powerful she can even protect Rover! With that, I won't ever let go...
Haha... You're all stained in red, just like Danjin.
Will this make everyone happy as a present?
I've got lots of clients, but you stick out the most.
Only a genuine business relationship can ensure the precision of my judgment. But come to think about it, you, my friend, your very existence is mistful itself.
No matter what, I can guarantee the reliability of friendship this Blake Bloom holds. You are welcome to join Black Shores any time.
From this day forth, we are officially business partners. Let's see, why don't you start by watering the Parterre first?
The mist will always be at your side, so feel free to leave your surroundings to me, partner.

When it comes to doing magic, I wasn't really into it at first, but it's quite handy, you feel me? Disguises for infiltration, collecting intel, and… for runnin' for my dear life. Ah yes, most importantly, giving everyone a good laugh. See? You enjoyed it, right?
Black Shores needs some renovations... Care to spare a man some Coins?

I've tasted food from all over the world. If I have to mention one dish, it would be An'ke's Coral Bowl, its flavor was a bit quirky and I tried to stop eating it but just couldn't resist for some reason.

Exposing weaknesses is a big no-no for me, but if you really wanna know, I guess it's ok. There's a dish called Tacetite Pudding, that taste and texture, just thinking about it makes me wanna turn my tongue into mist.
Enjoy it while it lasts, or hope for forever peace in this world.
This is a C. V. Token. You know first hand what influences bearing a special identity may bring, no?
I'm no walking encyclopedia, I just happen to know things about various nations that's all. Is it a good thing or bad thing? I couldn’t really tell either.

Made by an artisan of the Six Nations, a garland purely handmade. How's that for a gift? C'mon, don't give me that look, I've traveled all over the world, I think it's fair that I call myself an expert craftsman. Fresh Blake Blooms hand-picked and handmade. If thats not sincerity, I don't know what else. Haha, Happy Birthday, my loyal patron.
Credibility in the name, and customer satisfaction is the game. Enjoy hassle-free services 24/7.
When all of this is over, going back to being a magician wouldn't be too bad.
Regardless the identity, my goals will never change.

Howdy, the name's Aalto. I've got everything you need, from food and housing, to trades and information, you name it. A discount? These are hard to come by you know. However, I'm quite fond of gullible people such as yourself, so you're in luck. Haha.
G'day. What does our loyal client wish to inquire for today?
Huh? You wanna see a magic trick?
Come to think of it, we do share a common goal.
Thanks, I'll offer you something extra next time.
Cash on delivery, the usual. Extras? Now why would I ever promise that? Relax, just kiddin', its already in your Terminal. Haha.
Now, I can bend mist into any form as I please. Your aid is much appreciated, partner!
If the mist wishes to conceal something within itself, no one can easily see through it.
Phew, in the nick of time.
Easy there, I was just passing by.
Hey, I was just messin' around!
Ouch! That's gonna leave a mark.
Aww man, that wasn't nice, ya know.
For once in a while... I need a breather.
What other tricks do you wana see?
How's that for a magic trick?!
Investments for Black Shores? That would be nice.
You have too many mysteries in you, and I am duty-bound to prevent Huanglong from risks. Please excuse anything where we might appear not courteous enough.
Now that you have proven yourself, I shall hold nothing back from you.
The Lament is no easy foe to defeat, but to attempt the hardly possible is a courage worthy of appreciation.
Responsibilities come with stress, which I know the best. Should you be tired, you are welcome to come back to Tiancheng any time for some rest.
At the flower sea in the Knell Square lie our warriors in peace. Someday should I fail to make it home, please look after them for me.
Although I'm no longer a doctor, I would exchange medical knowledge with my mother from time to time.
Overthinking merely gets you in disarray. Take actions instead. Fix the problem.
A well-known home recipe in Huanglong, Tiancheng Stew can be easily cooked with various ingredients. Sometimes during my warrior career away from home, I do miss that aroma.
Supplies don't come with ease and are not to be rashly squandered.

To fight this cruel world is like a debridement. Only by completely debriding the festered, contaminated wounds could the organism survive. So before this operation is done, I will not easily collapse.
Qingloong, a title of honor, many would regard; but for me, it means responsibility rather.
My mother was a proficient surgeon and my mentor. I did not refuse to take on her legacy; rather, I have found my own way to heal this world.

This is the gardebras I used when I was a recruit. It blocked many lethal blows for me. Some say it brings fortune and blesses a warrior unharmed from the battlefield. So I would like to gift it to you. Happy birthday.
Another way to continue their will.
Supply secured, sufficient to cope with emergency.
Jiyan, Commander of Midnight Rangers. I never regret choosing to walk in the long night.
If you lose your way, follow the banner of Qingloong.
Get behind me whenever there is danger.
The art of wielding power relies on creativity.
This is a departure from common ways, an invite for inspirations for me.
The Qingloong feels vigorous and ready to roam the universe. Thank you.
Use the land to my advantage.
Modal particle (when climbing or carrying weight. Don't pant too hard, just a touch of force will do)
If you need my help, prepare your offer beforehand. Save your rhetoric, because I am no philanthropist, and I don't have the time to waste for you.
You are such a persistent person. You could be a promising talent if you save that energy for something that can use it... Anyway, I don't hate persistent people.

There is... a strange frequency in you. Even for me, it is the first time to see such virginal yet profound frequencies. They are like ancient scores passed down, which can only be played to their full in the hands of a virtuoso.
Your growth rate far surpasses the current categories of Wutherlogical explanation... How many secrets on earth are yet to be found in you? How intriguing.

Your presence completely upsets my knowledge of Wutherlogy. Fortunately, you have always been a company of mine. With that said, the Red Dragon now wishes to extend you a formal invite - Join me in burning down the Time Cages of fatuity and arrogance with blazes, fellow
Melodious tunes are always a placation for the Red Dragon's rage.
Research is merely instrument, not magic. Don't you have unrealistic fantasies about research like someone does.

The pleasantness of food is not only about the material, but the circumstances. To bring out the utmost taste, a fresh cut of Limox short rib should be rarely cooked with charred butter, served in a bone plate, which should be heated to 30 degrees, and eaten with a Symphony. If that cannot be done, it makes no difference to just take my self-made sugar pills. Energy consumption anyway.
Any bungled food is wastes of chewing muscle.
O the "ghosts" imprisoned in Time Gaps, I shall burn out your pain, until the rage is quenched.
Sure this lighter can be ignited, though you better pray it won't be.

I had everything, but the very sense of living. No jewels or dresses could stifle my agitation. I kept hearing whimpers of resentment and howls of helplessness... In the end, great fire destroyed the vainly gorgeous curtains, and gave birth to a Red Dragon. (pause slightly longer here) Yes, I myself set the fire.

Here comes THE RENOWNED Rover, who is not going to ask just for a dispensable gift from me, I anticipate? Well, I have preparations luckily... (getting pregnant in tone) A special sugar pill for your birthday, which I promise, you will never forget.
Tut-tut, the mess in the lab when I'm absent! Looks like a concert with poor taste.
Knowledge flows into brain along with melodies.
Blazing flames don't always burn hands.

(Sarcastic) What a small fry researcher I am, when there is the known-to-everyone Rover. How kind of you to ask for my name. (Objective) Mortefi, specialist in Tacetite research. If you need help regarding Tacetite, find me at the Huanglong Academy. (Pregnant) Be prepared, though, to offer compensation. Basic manner, dare I say.
(a little impatient) Speak, what is it this time?
Not bad catering to my fancy a bit. (a little pregnant. Fancy=killing)
(Sarcastic) You are a master of telling people what to do.
An amazing bar can lighten up a whole dull movement for sure, especially when the movement is worth burnishing.
Such impressive power! If this could be used for the Tacetite research, we will have much better progress. The accommodating Rover will not be shy of assistance, I assume?
If it were for that power... even the irrepressible Red Dragon will lower its proud head and exchange with its life's treasure.

Now that you have offered power, I am obliged to show my sincerity. Here, a scale just taken off. Take care. After all it is a treasure that can summon the Red Dragon anytime, and it is meant only for you.
You shall be burnt into ashes! (Furious and a bit insane)
Hah, you got guts I'll give you that.
I can finally enjoy myself for once it seems. (excited and a little pretentious)
The lingering sound... shall not dissipate.
Get ouuut. (Summoning pet. elongating "out" for impatient feeling)
A temporary test of resistance index.
Can't you think of a more clever way of doing this?
Hmm? Keep looking, you might even find some legendary treasures underneath.

Oh? You are curious about the Trial Chamber? What is your version? Solitary box, the cage, or the interrogation of silver thread? Hm hm, wait no more, you are to meet the stringed interrogation personally.

The strings binding you state that various frequencies mix in you. Is that what you call the omni-containing sound? Humph, what is the weening in you that convinces your intensive overexertion? Fine, I will run a sensitive check on your body, until I am assured you present no problem.
Shh, little one, make no mess. Can't you see our Rover is frightened? Oh, the look on your face…surely you don't think I am going too far, as the weak would complain? Easy, not even close.

You want to survive? You do have a strong will to living. I wouldn't have bothered my strings for the diagnosis if you came to this sense sooner. Bear with me for now, though, the trial will be done in a minute. You won't disappoint me, will you?

You won over your desire with absolute senses. Congrats on not having been overwhelmed by power. Beware, however, my anticipated Rover, of your physical conditions before delving into your power again, unless it's your wish to be a... regular visitor of my chamber.

I closed my mother's tailor shop, though sometimes when I pass by, I could still see the image of her pruning her qipao. Heh, guess I'm affected by your sentiment, that should be the only explanation for me sharing with you.
Friend is no necessity to me, but people seem like trying to make me acquaintance recently. What? I look lonely? Don't patronize me with your puny sentiment.
I thought "Hai'er Xiao" was an appropriate name. But I've never had that dish since my mother's death. Can't even remember how it tastes like to be "sweet and crisp".

He used to say sweet and sour fillet always put smiles on children's faces, which we always had on our table. He was even holding the ingredients for the dish on that last day. If I look back now, what a satire it was, "Hai'er Xiao".
Most keep flowery causes on their tongue, few put them to action. Which are you?
You're overthinking. This is just a convenient weapon for me, without any thought of remembering the past. Hump? Holding resentment, are we? Little one.

Sometimes you seem so bold as beyond sense. You are inquiring about the inquisitor's tales while others try their best to shun me. Well if you are so interested in how I interrogate the overclocking, you are invited to my chamber. I will show you every twist and turn NICE AND SLOW.

A birthday party? With them? A warm and welcoming puppet show? Are you out of... Fine, for the sake of your sincerity, I'll give it a thought. Oh, please do take this box of threads as your warning. A warning for you to look after your overfrequncy status, don't ever be so reckless again and stop visiting my chamber.
Green light, Green light... Red light. Good puppet. Let me think, what should be the new punishment next time I catch you sneaking, let's find out.
Don't tell me you're that kind who indulge in the past. Heh... You didn't let down.

Yinlin, Midnight Ranger Inquisitor. You have no sign of overclocking. Now if you'll excuse me... Hmph? Didn't anybody tell you it's not a good idea to provoke the Inquisitor, or you want a tour in my chamber where I can give you a good pestering of my strings?
Action at will. I will make my judgement if necessary.
Keeping an Inquisitor around... Hump, I'll take that as a sign of trust.
Don't get me wrong. I'm just supervising your overfrequent state.
It goes the same for them at the beginning: a taste of power. However, once the gate of greed is let loose, it hardly closes.
How pathetic the weak. Always supposing themselves the chosen ones, craving for greater power. They end up in self-destruction. Me? Never.
Heh, testing my limit? Don't ever underestimate the inquisitor.
Unrestrained desire could be destructive. I know boundaries. Stop here.
Green light, green light, red light!
Is this the price of being the inquisitor?
En, conducive to targeting overclocking Resonators.
Shall I get you a drink? Impress me with your story. (routine greeting to guests. Not much emotion)
Am I one that lives in the past? Hm... Every man is a product of his past, no? (a little annoyed being asked in return for a story)
What do you think plays the critical part in my tea therapy, the tea, the rhythmic syrup, or the mind?
The remains of the past haunt me, but your company has dissipated the gloom, even just part of it.
You are a regular guest and a close friend. I assume you've been familiar enough with tea therapy. Do you want to perform a session? Try me.
If only I could spend more time with little fluffies... How about redesigning Nightingale's so it looks more like its name, what do you say?
When I serve the tea, the phrase I use the most to my guests is "let go". But as ironic as it sounds, I myself am the one who didn't let go, and I don't even know when I could.

People vary, like teas differ. Every man has his favorite, while mine is the “tranquil emerald” tea. When the dim green beverage flows down my stomach, it seems I could swallow along the astringency the pains of those days.

Why on earth is there Edodes in Tiancheng Maocai? I have a taste for spiciness, and I love the most to sip a cup of tea when the spices work to their climax. The sweet aftertaste of tea can finely balance the little prickles in extreme hotness. The feeling is almost addicting. However the adding of Edodes really turns me away from the dish. Maybe I should ask Madame Panhua to make me a customized one?
Dim Forest... No, maybe the best I can do is a tribute of flower to them, when this is all over.
Curious what is hidden under the gloves? I am merely a tea house keeper, not a magician... Hidden under is time of tears and blood, which might have left more distinct marks on my face.

I heard countless stories here. They are so full of colors, regrets, and pains that the past I have gone through could not compare, but I just could not walk away. I left myself forever in that Night of Flashing Thunder.
Happy birthday. Since my retirement from the Midnight Rangers, I have never celebrated my birthdays. These days, feel like I don't deserve them... Am I worthy to share your pleasure today?
Hm?... Ha... Did you smell dried fish around here?
Hm... Fragrance lingers almost like a melody, but there's not much left. Maybe I should drink later?
Um... Fear not, it's a coincidence.
Welcome to Nightingale's Tea House, guest I've just met. I am Yuanwu, the keeper of this tea house. Should you be free, come over and have a drink, on me.
To endure pain is my atonement.
Don't hurry. Let's use some tea.
The power of thunder has progressed. It might become able to settle some more cases of injustice.
Regular use of tea improves the strength and the mind. I will continue my atonement with this power, until I am free from the shadows of the past.
If I were so powerful then, those fantasies surfacing from tea's aroma, will they come true?...
Thank you. Power like this almost puts me in my prime. All right, maybe I cannot protect everyone, but at least allow me to protect you.
Rallying soon! (A feeling of trying to ready himself again quickly after taking severe hit)
Do this a lot at my tea house. (ample and confident due to regular training)
Full of surprises, just like being an audience at the tea house.
